column4: what's the most stable video card for ubuntu?  we're looking at setting up a bunch of machines

What are you going to do with the video card? I have an internal intel graphics processor and I'm very happy with it because of the free drivers, but if you're going to play demanding games then maybe that's not for you.
i like warcraft 3 tower defenses too much :)
Warcraft 3 is an old game, it might work, I don't know. I'd look it up if I was you :)
